description: Eligibility Requirements Full-time undergraduate student (enrolled in 12 hours or more) U.S. citizen Declared Accounting OR Finance major Must have completed 45+ hours at the time of application Not graduating prior to Fall 2023 Minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA Preference to be given to students who are active in campus academic activities, the Accounting Club and the Finance Club Preference to be given to students who work during the calendar year or who are active in extracurricular activities on campus Financial need to be considered Applicants who have family members who work at BOK are eligible to apply, but preference not given.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
